014
015package org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.definitions;
016
017import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkState;
018
019import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.Field;
020import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.FieldContext;
021import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.IgnoreWarnFailCreate;
022import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.ValueCache;
023
024import java.io.File;
025import java.io.IOException;
026import java.util.List;
027import java.util.Objects;
028import java.util.Optional;
029import java.util.StringJoiner;
030import java.util.function.Function;
031
032import com.google.common.annotations.VisibleForTesting;
033import com.google.common.base.Splitter;
034
035/**
036 * Common properties for a field.
037 */
038public abstract class FieldDefinition<T> {
039
040    protected FieldDefinition() {
041    }
042
043    @VisibleForTesting
044    protected FieldDefinition(String id) {
045        this.id = id;
046    }
047
048    /**
049     * Name of the build property to define. Field injected by Maven.
050     */
051    String id = null;
052
053    /**
054     * True skips the parsing of this definition. Field injected by Maven.
055     */
056    boolean skip = false;
057
058    /**
059     * Whether to export this number directly. Field injected by Maven.
060     */
061    boolean export = false;
062
063    /**
064     * Name of the property from the properties file. Field injected by Maven.
065     */
066    String propertyNameInFile = null;
067
068    /**
069     * Name of the properties file to persist the count. Field injected by Maven.
070     */
071    File propertyFile = null;
072
073    /**
074     * What to do when the property is missing from the file.
075     */
076    private IgnoreWarnFailCreate onMissingFile = IgnoreWarnFailCreate.FAIL;
077
078    public void setOnMissingFile(String onMissingFile) {
079        this.onMissingFile = IgnoreWarnFailCreate.forString(onMissingFile);
080    }
081
082    /**
083     * What to do when the property is missing from the file.
084     */
085    private IgnoreWarnFailCreate onMissingProperty = IgnoreWarnFailCreate.FAIL;
086
087    public void setOnMissingProperty(String onMissingProperty) {
088        this.onMissingProperty = IgnoreWarnFailCreate.forString(onMissingProperty);
089    }
090
091    /**
092     * The initial value for this field. Field injected by Maven.
093     */
094    String initialValue = null;
095
096    /**
097     * Format for this element. Field injected by Maven.
098     */
099    String format = null;
100
101    /**
102     * Comma separated list of String transformers.
103     */
104    private List<String> transformers = List.of();
105
106    void setTransformers(String transformers) {
107        this.transformers = Splitter.on(",")
108            .omitEmptyStrings()
109            .trimResults()
110            .splitToList(transformers);
111    }
112
113    public abstract <U extends Field<?, ?>> U createField(FieldContext context, ValueCache valueCache) throws IOException;
114
115    public String getId() {
116        return id;
117    }
118
119    public boolean isSkip() {
120        return skip;
121    }
122
123    public List<String> getTransformers() {
124        return transformers;
125    }
126
127    public Optional<String> getInitialValue() {
128        return Optional.ofNullable(initialValue);
129    }
130
131    public boolean isExport() {
132        return export;
133    }
134
135    public String getPropertyNameInFile() {
136        return Objects.requireNonNullElse(propertyNameInFile, id);
137    }
138
139    public Optional<File> getPropertyFile() {
140        return Optional.ofNullable(propertyFile);
141    }
142
143    public IgnoreWarnFailCreate getOnMissingFile() {
144        return onMissingFile;
145    }
146
147    public IgnoreWarnFailCreate getOnMissingProperty() {
148        return onMissingProperty;
149    }
150
151    public Function<T, String> formatResult() {
152        return value -> Optional.ofNullable(value).map(getFormat()).orElse("");
153    }
154
155    public Function<T, String> getFormat() {
156        return format == null ? String::valueOf : v -> String.format(format, v);
157    }
158
159    public void check() {
160        checkState(id != null, "the id element must not be empty!");
161
162        if (propertyNameInFile != null) {
163            checkState(propertyFile != null, "can not define <propertyNameInFile> without defining <propertyFile>!");
164        }
165    }
166
167    @Override
168    public String toString() {
169        return new StringJoiner(", ", FieldDefinition.class.getSimpleName() + "[", "]")
170            .add("id='" + id + "'")
171            .add("skip=" + skip)
172            .add("export=" + export)
173            .add("propertyNameInFile='" + propertyNameInFile + "'")
174            .add("propertyFile=" + propertyFile)
175            .add("onMissingFile='" + onMissingFile + "'")
176            .add("onMissingProperty='" + onMissingProperty + "'")
177            .add("initialValue='" + initialValue + "'")
178            .add("format='" + format + "'")
179            .add("transformers='" + transformers + "'")
180            .toString();
181    }
182
183    @Override
184    public boolean equals(Object o) {
185        if (this == o) {
186            return true;
187        }
188        if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) {
189            return false;
190        }
191        FieldDefinition<?> that = (FieldDefinition<?>) o;
192        return skip == that.skip && export == that.export && Objects.equals(id, that.id) && Objects.equals(propertyNameInFile, that.propertyNameInFile)
193            && Objects.equals(propertyFile, that.propertyFile) && Objects.equals(onMissingFile, that.onMissingFile)
194            && Objects.equals(onMissingProperty, that.onMissingProperty) && Objects.equals(initialValue, that.initialValue)
195            && Objects.equals(format, that.format) && Objects.equals(transformers, that.transformers);
196    }
197
198    @Override
199    public int hashCode() {
200        return Objects.hash(id, skip, export, propertyNameInFile, propertyFile, onMissingFile, onMissingProperty, initialValue, format, transformers);
201    }
202}
